text: asadharanaye bhumiyehi unagukamin hæsirennan mage niyogayan pratiksepa karana lesata pat karannemi. ebævin ovun sadhakayan siyalla (tama dæsin) dutuvada, eva visvasama nokarannaha. esema rju margaya ovun dutuvada, ovun eya (taman) ya yutu margaya vasayen bara nogannaha. ehet væradi margaya dutuvahot nam, eyama (taman) ya yutu margaya vasayen bara gannaha. niyata vasayenma ovun apage ayavan boru kara, eva pratiksepa kara, nosælakilimatva sitimama meyata hetuva ve
